title: Spring Is Here
description: Spring Is Here introduces readers to the signs of spring in different outdoor settings, such as the garden, pond, and mountains. The text includes a table of contents and glossary of content vocabulary words.
reviewWords: buds, bulbs, dandelion, garden, gophers, meadow, ponds, shoots, water lily, wiggly, woods
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in text
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Identify and use quotation marks
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Identify content vocabulary words
